long_description: Use the olloclip 3-In-One Lens with your iPhone 5/5s to capture beautiful fish-eye, wide-angle and macro pictures when you're on the go. 3-In-One Lens gives you fish-eye, wide-angle and macro lens capabilities; easily attach or remove the lens in seconds. Macro lens applies roughly a 10x multiplier and allows you to focus the iPhone within 12 - 15mm of the subject; fish-eye lens captures approximately a 180deg field-of-view. Wide-angle lens approximately doubles the field of view of the normal iPhone lens. olloclip 3-In-One Lens comes with a microfiber carry case that doubles as a lens cleaner.
short_description: Use the olloclip 3-In-One Lens with your iPhone 5/5s to capture beautiful fish-eye, wide-angle and macro pictures when you're on the go.
